Html: I don't understand the purpose of the MSI Product Code and the "Reverse Rule", can someone explain to me when they should be used?

MSI Product Code : see this link

Reverse Rule : If you make a rule that say : "Instalable if this MSI product code is present", and check "Reverse Rule" then the rule become "Instalable if this MSI product code is NOT present"
Thank you for your explanation. Time for me to experiment!
